title: Guard Your Words
description: Today, avoid flirtatious or suggestive language in all conversations — online or in person.

title: 3-Day Speech Purity
description: Speak respectfully and modestly for 3 days. Avoid playful messaging that crosses limits.

title: 7-Day Messaging Cleanse
description: Avoid texting or speaking with romantic intent to anyone outside of marriage for 7 days.

title: Respect Personal Boundaries
description: Do not place yourself in a one-on-one private setting with a non-mahram today.

title: 3-Day Halwa Barrier
description: Avoid all private, unsupervised contact with the opposite gender for 3 days.

title: 7 Days of Honour
description: Protect your dignity and that of others by avoiding any risky proximity for 7 days.

title: Skip the Scene
description: Today, fast-forward or avoid any sexualised scene in shows, music, or books.

title: 3-Day Content Reset
description: Avoid all romantic or sensual entertainment — music, video, novels — for 3 days.

title: 7-Day Desire Detox
description: Cleanse your media intake. Focus on modest, inspiring content only for 7 days.

title: Shift the Thought
description: Today, when a lustful thought arises, immediately make dhikr or say a du‘a of protection.

title: 3-Day Mind Rewire
description: Actively replace indecent thoughts with thoughts of Jannah or death for 3 days.

title: 7 Days of Thought Control
description: Guard your inner gaze. Monitor your thoughts and redirect temptations all week.

title: Unfollow Temptation
description: Today, unfollow any account that tempts you toward lust or comparison.

title: 3-Day Scroll Purity
description: For the next 3 days, limit screen time and avoid apps that encourage visual temptation.

title: 7-Day Social Reset
description: Detox your digital space. Only allow feeds that remind you of modesty and sincerity.

title: Cut the Thread
description: Mute or archive one chat that you know leads you to sin. Give yourself space today.

title: 3-Day Boundaries
description: Avoid replying or initiating flirtatious contact with any non-mahram for 3 days.

title: 7-Day Exit Strategy
description: Begin planning to end any illicit relationship. Make istighfar and write your intention.

title: Du‘a of Hope
description: Read or listen to the du‘a of Yunus (as) today. Reflect on its power to lift shame.

title: 3-Day Mercy Reminder
description: Repeat daily: ‘Allah’s mercy is greater than my sin.’ Make sincere du‘a each day.

title: 7 Days of Returning
description: For 7 days, pray 2 rak‘at of tawbah and write one reflection on healing and hope.
